## ReadableLiquity.getTotalRedistributed() method

Get the total collateral and debt per stake that has been liquidated through redistribution.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTotalRedistributed(): Promise<Trove>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Trove](./arth-lib-base.trove.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Remarks

Needed when dealing with instances of [TroveWithPendingRedistribution](./arth-lib-base.trovewithpendingredistribution.md)<!-- -->.
